name.text: Finding the the distance between point A and point B on a number line.

questiontext.text:
On the number line below, determine the distance between point \(A\) and point \(B\)

[[jsxgraph height='100px']] JXG.Options.text.useMathJax=true; var brd = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingbox: [-{#b-2#}, {#1/a#}, {#b+2#}, -{#1/a#}], showCopyright:false, keepaspectratio:true, grid:true, showNavigation:false}); var axisx = brd.create('axis', [[0, 0], [1, 0]], { firstArrow: true, lastArrow: true, ticks: { drawZero: true, ticksDistance: 1, majorHeight: 10, tickEndings: [1, 1], minorTicks: 0 } }); //var p = brd.create('glider', [2.2, 0, axisx], {}); // Points var p1 = brd.create('point', [{#a#}, 0], {name: 'A', size: 4, strokeColor: 'blue', fixed:true}); var p2 = brd.create('point', [{#b#}, 0], {name: 'B', size: 4, strokeColor: 'black', fixed:true}); // Line segment var line = brd.create('segment', [p1, p2], {strokeColor: 'red', strokeWidth: 2,fixed:true}); // Distance label //var distance = brd.create('text', [(p1.X() + p2.X()) / 2, -0.15, () => `Distance: ${Math.abs(p1.X() - p2.X())}`], {anchorX: 'middle', anchorY: 'top',fixed:true}); brd.update(); [[/jsxgraph]]

Distance between \(A\) and \(B\): [[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]] units [[feedback:prt1]]

generalfeedback.text:
Worked Solution

The distance between two points \(A\) and \(B\) on a number line can be calculated using the absolute value of the difference between their coordinates.

In this case, point \(A\) is \({@a@}\) and point \(B\) is {@b@}.

Distance \(=|B - A|\)

Distance \(=|{@b@} - {@a@}|\)

Distance \(=|{@ta@}|\)

Distance \(= {@ta@}\) units.

Therefore, the distance between \(A\) and \(B\) on the number line is {@ta@} units as shown in the real number line below:

[[jsxgraph height='100px']] JXG.Options.text.useMathJax=true; var brd = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingbox: [-{#b-2#}, {#1/a#}, {#b+2#}, -{#1/a#}], showCopyright:false, keepaspectratio:true, grid:true, showNavigation:false}); var axisx = brd.create('axis', [[0, 0], [1, 0]], { firstArrow: true, lastArrow: true, ticks: { drawZero: true, ticksDistance: 1, majorHeight: 10, tickEndings: [1, 1], minorTicks: 0 } }); //var p = brd.create('glider', [2.2, 0, axisx], {}); // Points var p1 = brd.create('point', [{#a#}, 0], {name: 'A={#a#}', size: 4, strokeColor: 'blue',fixed:true}); var p2 = brd.create('point', [{#b#}, 0], {name: 'B={#b#}', size: 4, strokeColor: 'black',fixed:true}); // Line segment var line = brd.create('segment', [p1, p2], {strokeColor: 'red', strokeWidth: 2,fixed:true}); // Distance label var distance = brd.create('text', [(p1.X() + p2.X()) / 2, -0.15, () => `Distance: ${Math.abs(p1.X() - p2.X())}`], {anchorX: 'bottom', anchorY: 'top',fixed:true}); brd.update(); [[/jsxgraph]]
